name: Mainframe Overload
description:
Drones AIs have rebelled and are attacking your computers !

As the last standing IT guru, you must defend your mainframe by creating sentries or by hitting drones with your trusty keyboard 

Don’t forget to connect a cable from your sentries to your computers or they won’t have any power

Controls

All controls can rebinds in the options menu

  • WASD / Arrows : Move around 
  • Space : Attack 
  • F : Sentries build mode 
  • E : Interact to place or connect sentries
